text: When you visit our site, our servers may record data from your browser.

When you link your account to Zoom, we request the scope to view information about the profile, this allows us to display your name and profile picture in the application as well as to get the owner account of the Zoom account.
We may transmit personal information to: third party service providers for the purpose of providing their service.
We may transmit personal information to:
We only store Zoom data we need to make sendbloop functionnal.
